channel.title: Were do i get a canvas?
channel.description: i need a canvas..i'm very new to this...please help..NO FLAMING PLEASE

item.title: Were do i get a canvas?
item.dc:creator: @Vahuka Vahuka
item.description:
@Vahuka wrote:

don’t worry man photoshop can be tricky but read some tuts and you’ll have good to excellent graphics in no time!
(at least your not like “OMG!!!& WHERE IS TEH PAINT BRUSH IN TEH PR0GR4MZORRSSS!!!9”)
and a canvas is a fancy name for an image, what i worry about more are layers I HATE THE DAMN THINGS!!
sometimes

item.title: Were do i get a canvas?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Erm, I don’t understand what you mean.

If you want a new Canvas in Photoshop, go to File>New and then select the dimensions.

If you want a Canvas which you can paint on, go to an Art store.

Read full topic
